articles.title: Video: Trump's National Guard comments un-American, ex-police officer says - CNN Video
articles.description: Former DC Metropolitan police officer Michael Fanone, who was attacked by rioters on January 6, and Anderson Cooper discuss the difference between former President Donald Trump's comments about law enforcement and how he acted on January 6.

articles.author: Jessie Yeung and Kathleen Magramo, CNN
articles.title: 7.0-magnitude earthquake strikes northern Philippines
articles.description: A 7.0-magnitude earthquake struck the Philippines on Tuesday, according to the US Geological Survey (USGS).

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Trump shows his 2024 campaign would take the country down a dark and dangerous road
articles.description: The last time Donald Trump delivered a major speech in Washington, DC, from outside the White House it unleashed a vicious mob attack. There was no violence this time, but his searing bombast may have heralded the dawn of a new era of American extremism.

articles.title: CNN Poll: 75% of Democratic voters want someone other than Biden in 2024
articles.description: A new CNN poll finds 75% of Democratic and Democratic-leaning voters want the party to nominate someone other than President Joe Biden in the 2024 election, a sharp increase from earlier this year.

articles.title: Latest moves suggest DOJ investigation of 2020 election is looking at conduct directly related to Trump and his closest allies

articles.author: Joan Biskupic, CNN legal analyst & Supreme Court biographer
articles.title: The inside story of how John Roberts failed to save abortion rights
articles.description: It appears unlikely that Roberts' best prospect -- Justice Brett Kavanaugh -- was ever close to switching his earlier vote.
